1.content:
There are many things in this world yet to be seen, but one thing is for certain animals have coexisted in a way never seen before and not in the normal way of working together with whoever they exist with, but it seems as though having a round and fattened belly seems to be the way to go in this world. It is anywhere from a sign of wealth to even a normal fashion trend if the animal isn't fat then it's not healthy.




In this world, you can either be one of three things a human, an anthro, or a feral it is up to you to decide what you are






Now what are you?
1.title: The Beginning!

11.content: So you have chosen to be human! Well, then you have a few options!
11.title: Human

111.content: A male human well then will this human have a pet dog, cat, maybe a wild animal, or something else?
111.title: Male

1111.content:
Now, will he have a loyal canine companion?
Or maybe a feline that comes and goes maybe only to be seen during dinner?
Or maybe he will have another animal...
1111.title: Domestic

11111.content: What kind of dog are we talking about?
11111.title: Dog

111112.content:
Tim was currently sat in his apartment reading a book on the couch. The 24year old man was currently waiting for his lover to return from his trip out, Mike had not told him where he was going, but that he was going to be returning with a surprise. After a while, Tim was starting to get impatient the young man looking up at the clock which read 2:00 P.M.

         Mike was currently pulling back into the driveway to the house the young 23-year-old man was currently giddy as he put the car into park and got out. Mike walked over to the back of the car opening the back seat doors and out hopped a rather large husky! Mike happily walked with the new companion right up to the front door taking his keys and unlocking the door "Tim I'm home!" the man said holding the husky's lead. As Tim came around the corner Mike began to explain "Well here is your surprise! I know we have been wanting to try some things for a while and well here is our first pet to do them on!" Mike said happily watching the husky.

          Tim looked over the husky curiously as he reached out to pet him the young pup happily pressing his head into the hand while he let out a happy whistle his tail wagging rapidly excited for new owners. "Does he have a name?" asked Tim. Mike responded with a shake of his head before Tim piped up once again "How about Spike!" he said happily letting out a chuckle as the husky barked out and licked the humans hand.

         Mike knelt down taking off the lead before walking over to the kitchen "well then let's get started!" he said soon returning with...
111112.title: Husky

1113.content: Multiple animals, or perhaps an animal at the zoo?
1113.title: Multiple/Other

12.content: Alright then you're an anthropomorphic animal now it's time to choose your gender.
12.title: Anthro

info.brief_description: Animals and humans all living together, but something seems off about the animals.
info.description:
There is a world out there that is full of Animals, humans, and even animal-human hybrids that live together. There seems to be nothing out of the ordinary but something seems to be a bit bigger than normal; it seems to be the waistlines of all the animals!

in this interactive story, you can play as either a number of humans or animals!

For a forum specifically about fat dogs: https://fatdog.freeforums.net/

Mostly anything is aloud but the main focus of the story is for the animals of the world to get fat by pretty much any means

Sex between humans and animals is allowed.
Weight gain is allowed.
Inflation is allowed.
Popping is allowed.
